text: Serhiy Anatoliyovych Shubin (; born 22 February 1967 in Kiev) is a former Ukrainian football player. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Sportspeople from Kyiv Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC CSKA Kyiv players Category:FC Torpedo Zaporizhia players Category:FC Nyva Vinnytsia players Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:Diósgyőri VTK players Category:Ukrainian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Hungary Category:FC Volyn Lutsk players Category:FC Chortkiv players Category:FC Zhemchuzhina Sochi players Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Kuban Krasnodar players Category:FC Metallurg Lipetsk players Category:Association football forwards
title: Serhiy Shubin
